message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In an income statement, the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically labeled as "Cost of Goods Sold" (COGS). This represents the direct costs attributable to the production of the goods sold by a company.

Looking at the income statement provided:
- The account "Cost of Goods Sold" has a value of 10,400,000.00 on 2024-02-05

Therefore, the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 10,400,000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '10400000.00'}}
```
